channel.title: Laurel, MD Local Info by Bozzuto

item.title: BG & the Mojo Hands - BG & the Mojo Hands
item.description:
Ages: All Ages

BG & the Mojo Hands plays from 7:30-9:30pm. Our first concert at this fine outdoor venue. Big stage, nestled in Laurel, MD. Saxophonist Hollywood Thompson who performs with the band at swing dances joins us for this show in the Montpelier Mansion.

When: Jul 9, 2010 7:30:00 PM
Where: Montpelier Arts Center in Laurel, Maryland
item.author: nobody@evdb.com (evdb)
item.media:text: <b>Ages: </b>All Ages<br> <br> BG & the Mojo Hands plays from 7:30-9:30pm. Our first concert at this fine outdoor venue. Big stage, nestled in Laurel, MD. Saxophonist Hollywood Thompson who performs with the band at swing dances joins us for this show in the Montpelier Mansion.<br/><br/><b>When: </b>Jul 9, 2010 7:30:00 PM <br/> <b>Where: </b> Montpelier Arts Center in Laurel, Maryland

item.title: Jul 6, 2010: Twilight Tram Tour at The National Wildlife Visitor Center
item.description: Enjoy a 45 minute guided tour through the habitats of Patuxent Research Refuge on an all electric, open-air tram. View wildlife and their habitats while discovering the story of how the land has changed over time and how Patuxent is managing habitats for wildlife. Tickets are $4 for adults, $3 for seniors over 55, and $2 for children under 12. Please bring exact change. Space is limited.

item.title: Shakespeare on Main Street
item.description: "A Midsummer Night's Dream" continues weekends at Laurel Mill Playhouse, 508 Main St.Presented by Laurel Mill Playhouse's annual Summer Youth Shakespeare Theatre, this Shakespearean comedy is directed by Michael Hartsfield and produced by Maureen Rogers. The ensemble cast hails from both Laurel and the metropolitan area. Performances run weekends...
